messages.title: A plan for a fairer Britain:

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems have delivered a £800 income tax cut for 25 million workers. Now they are campaigning for a further £400 income tax cut.
The Lib Dems have committed to invest £8 billion a year more into the NHS to ensure that it remains a world-class service.
The Lib Dem 'Pupil Premium' has delivered £2.5 billion extra for schools nationwide to stop children falling behind. They are campaigning for increased pre-school childcare.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Who will really deliver for Headingley and Hyde Park?

issues.education: The Lib Dem 'Pupil Premium' has delivered £2.5 billion extra for schools nationwide to stop children falling behind.
issues.health: The Lib Dems have committed to invest £8 billion a year more into the NHS.
